patterns: I have forgotten password for logging in AICTE Web Portal. What is the procedureto recover this?
Is it possible for users to reset their password for AICTE Web Portal without losing the security features?
How can I reset my password to AICTE Web Portal?
I forgot my password to AICTE web portal. How could I recover this?
How do I find my old password in the AICTE web portal?
I had forgotten my password to AICTE web portal. What should I do?
How do I reset AICTE password when I forgot it?
I forget my password for my AICTE Web portal. How can I log in?
I don't remember my password to AICTE Web Portal. How can I access to it?
What can I do if I forgot my password for the AICTE Web Portal?
How do I recover my AICTE Web Access Password?
responses: Kindly fill User Id or Institute Permanent Id or any of the Application Ids and click on Submit Request. Click on Click Here to Make Payment and make Online Payment of Rs 5000. Thereafter, please submit affidavit in concerned Regional Office to retrieve forgot password. Affidavit format is available in AICTE Approval Process Handbook

patterns: Is PAN No. field mandatory for 'Forgot Password' form?

Is PAN number necessary to submit Forgot Password form?
responses:
No, PAN Card is not mandatory. Only User Id or any one of the Application Ids is
required.

password' is displayed. What should I do?

responses:
Recheck the login credentials (Case sensitive). Confirm whether someone else has
logged in with the same credentials (Please note that per user only 3 sessions are
allowed. Hence, if someone tries for 4th session then again invalid user name and
password message will popup). If no session is live and still getting an invalid
username and password message then you can

responses:

page by Sitemap option. Sitemap option is available in Navigate Menu. Shortcut
Keyboard key for Sitemap is Ctrl+Shift+A.

patterns: I have made Online Payment but amount is not updated in portal
Is the amount I have made available in my payment system?
How can I make payment online but amount is not updated in portal?
I've paid using credit card without any verification, it still doesn't have my personal information. My payment is in kassa. I made the original payment via bank transfer. What is the problem?
I have made payment but amount is not updated in portal. I cant solve any problem using internet. I just have to pay in advance.
I had made online payment but the amount is not updated in portal. Is it the last one I have made?
I am making online payment but now I cannot find the amount of online payment in portal. please help me.
I made online payment but my amounts are not updated in portal nor saved in my webserver.
I have completed payments through noot.in my portal. The amount is not updated.Also no Noot.in portal is unable to be credited.
I made payment online but amount is not updated in portal. I have no account. It will not be rectified.

I made Online Payment but amount is not updated in portal. Available in 14 days. I want to make payment for any future will. But in PC platform, there is no solution to fix it. I have done payment in bank account and got rejected in that regard but my account was not accepted.
responses:
Generally, payment receipt gets updated immediately. Incase, your payment receipt 
is not updated then click on View Transaction Button under Payment tab. Otherwise 
it will get updated within 48 hours (2 working days). In case it is not updated even 
after that, please send details of the transaction (Transaction Id generated while 
making the payment) and application through Grievance form.

patterns:
We have applied for New Programme (Engineering/Architecture/Management/
Pharmacy/HMCT/MCA/Arts and Crafts) with level UG/PG/Diploma as New
Institution in 2017-18. However, the same was rejected and we have received Final
LOR. Can we apply again for starting New Institution in the same name?

How will we be able to apply again for the same name for New Institution (Engineering/Architecture/Management/ Pharmacy/HMCT/MCA/Arts and Crafts) in 2017-18. We have rejected the same and received Final LOR. Can we even get into the same institution?

We applied for New Programme (Engineering/Architecture/Management/ Pharmacy/HMCT/MCA/Arts and Crafts) with level UG/PG/Diploma as new Institution in 2017-18. However, the same was rejected and we have received Final LOR. How do I apply again for starting New Institution in the same name?

We had applied for New Programme (Engineering/Architecture/Management/Pharmacy/HMCT/MCA/Arts and Crafts) with level UG/PG/Diploma as New Institution in 2017-18. However, the same was rejected and we have received Final LOR. Can we apply again for starting new institutions in the same name?

We have applied for a new programme (Engineering/Architecture/Management/ Pharmacy/HMCT/MCA/Arts and Crafts) with level UG/PG/Diploma as New Institution in 2017-18. However, the same was rejected and we have received Final LOR. Can we apply again for starting New Institution in the same name?

We have applied for a new engineering programme (Engineering/Architecture/Management/ Pharmacy) with level UG/PG/Diploma at New Institution in 2017-18 but last year we received Final LOR. Can we apply again for starting new institution in the same name?

Our application has been rejected in 2017-2018 for New Programme of engineering/Architecture/Management/ Pharmacy (PG/MBC) with level UG/PG/Diploma (arts and crafts), can we apply again for starting New Institution in same name?

We have applied for new programme (Engineering/Architecture/Management/Pharmacy/HMCT/MCA/Arts and Crafts) with level UG/PG/Diploma as New Institution in 2017-18. The same was rejected and we have received Final LOR. Can we apply again for starting new institution in the same name?
Is it possible to apply again for New Programmes in Engineering & Architecture(Architecture/Management/Pharmacy) with level UG/PG or diploma in 2017-18?
responses:
Yes. You can apply a fresh as new Institution under Chapter I of APH 2018-19. You 
can use the existing User ID and apply for new Institution and required to pay TER 
Charges as applicable.

patterns:
Can a new standalone Management Institution start PGDM 120 seats and MBA 120 
seats at the same time if they satisfy all the requirements of AICTE?
Can a new standalone Management Institution start PGDM 120 seats and MBA 120 seats at the same time if they satisfy all the requirements of AICTE?
How will a new private administration commence PGDM 120 and MBA 120 seats at the same time?
Can an individual starting PGDM course with 120 seats completing MBA course has an MBA course in it.? If yes then how?
Does a new stand-alone management institution start PGDM 120 seats and MBA 120 seats at the same time if they satisfy all the requirements of AICTE?

Is it possible for a new management institution to offer PGDM 120 seats, but an MBA 120 seats at the same time?
responses:
No. The maximum Intake allowed for an Institution offering PG Programme in 
Management is 180 (inclusive of MBA and PGDM).
